## scaleRect() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function scaleRect(
  rect: Rect,
  scaleFactor: number
): {
  origin: {
    x: number;
    y: number;
  };
  size: {
    width: number;
    height: number;
  };
};
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                     | Description |
| ----------- | ------------------------ | ----------- |
| rect        | [Rect](./models.rect.md) |             |
| scaleFactor | number                   |             |

**Returns:**

{ origin: { x: number; y: number; }; size: { width: number; height: number; }; }
